content:
Blue Marlin Ibiza 位于美丽的 Cala Jondal 海湾，地理位置优越，是 Ibiza 最前卫的海滩娱乐场所。一旦踏入 Blue Marlin Ibiza ，将会有无限的选择。无论是在海滩上晒日光浴、在酒吧喝一杯鸡尾酒、在餐厅享用午餐和晚餐、随着国际 DJ 的节奏翩翩起舞，还是只是放松一下，Blue Marlin Ibiza 都将确保客人有宾至如归的感觉。

 

Blue Marlin Ibiza 拥有自己的电台 BMI Radio 和杂志 BMI:MAG，旨在吸引具有前瞻性思维的客户。 Blue Marlin Ibiza 从白天的休闲到晚间的娱乐，一定会让最挑剔的客人感到满意。 Blue Marlin ibiza 提供个性化的客户服务、礼宾车和出租车船服务。 Blue Marlin Ibiza 在服务质量和创新方面一直处于领先地位，在音乐选择、高端服务和娱乐方面始终处于前沿。

 

在开创了海滩娱乐形式并吸引了国际化人群之后，Blue Marlin Ibiza 已成为一种全球生活方式概念，在迪拜和墨西哥设有分店。
contentEn:
Ideally located in the beautiful bay of Cala Jondal, Blue Marlin Ibiza is the most avant-garde beach entertainment experience in Ibiza. Once stepped into Blue Marlin Ibiza’s world the choices are inﬁnite. Whether it is sunbathing on the beach, sipping a cocktail at the bar, enjoying lunch and dinner at the restaurant, dancing away to the beats of international DJ-sets or simply relaxing, Blue Marlin Ibiza will make sure guests are feeling at home in a laid-back environment.

 

With its own radio, BMI Radio, and magazine, BMI:MAG, Blue Marlin Ibiza aims to engage and entertain a forward-thinking clientele. Blue Marlin Ibiza’s smooth transition from daytime lounging to upbeat evening glamour, is bound to delight the most discerning guests. Blue Marlin ibiza offers a personalized customer service, courtesy car and taxi boat service. Blue Marlin Ibiza continues to lead the way in quality and innovation, remaining at the cutting-edge of musical selection, high-end service and entertainment.

 

After pioneering the beach entertainment format and attracting a cosmopolitan crowd – Blue Marlin Ibiza has become a global lifestyle concept, with locations in Dubai and Mexico.
remarks:

address: Cala Jondal, s/n, 07800 Ibiza, Balearic Islands
